name: Reverse scan
description: Scan clients ports to detect proxies or servers.

USE_REVERSE_SCAN.help: Enable scanning of clients ports and deny access if one is opened.
USE_REVERSE_SCAN.label: Reverse scan

REVERSE_SCAN_PORTS.help: List of port to scan when using reverse scan feature.
REVERSE_SCAN_PORTS.label: Reverse scan ports

REVERSE_SCAN_TIMEOUT.help: Specify the maximum timeout (in ms) when scanning a port.
REVERSE_SCAN_TIMEOUT.label: Reverse scan timeout
